title: How Your Theology Impacts Your Parenting
itunes:title: How Your Theology Impacts Your Parenting
description: The Bible is more important than our theological preferences, but does our theology impact our parenting? Are there specific pitfalls to watch out for, depending on where we fall on the theological spectrum?
content:encoded: The Bible is more important than our theological preferences, but does our theology impact our parenting? Are there specific pitfalls to watch out for, depending on where we fall on the theological spectrum?
itunes:subtitle: The Bible is more important than our theological preferences, but does our theology impact our parenting? Are there specific pitfalls to watch out for, depending on where we fall on the theological spectrum?
itunes:author: Ryan Coatney
